entry.title: A4 Luxury Boxed Sympathy Card 'Deepest Condolences'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Sympathy Cards
Price: 43.95

Send your deepest and comforting condolences to your loved ones or friends on their recent loss with this elegant handmade card. The design features the bouquet made from artificial peonies, calla lilies, ribbon roses and faux greenery. The card is presented in our signature luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Sympathy Card 'Heartfelt Condolences'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Sympathy Cards
Price: 19.95

Express your sympathy and send your heartfelt condolences to your near and dear ones with this classy handmade card. The design boasts three burgundy artificial lilies and cream ribbon roses tied together with burgundy satin and chiffon ribbon bow mounted to the to the print of beige swirl pattern and decorated with crystals.

This luxury boxed sympathy card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Sympathy Card 'Our Hearts are With You'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Sympathy Cards
Price: 19.25

This classy handmade card is perfect way to let your friends or family know that that your hearts are always with them at difficult times of sorrow and hardship. The main feature of the design is three artificial white lilies mounted to the print of elegant green floral pattern with white and green satin ribbons running across the print. The whole arrangement is also gorgeously handcrafted with white satin bow and gem in the middle.

This luxury boxed sympathy card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Sympathy Card 'You're in our Thoughts'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Sympathy Cards
Price: 18.50

Show all your sympathy to someone and let them know that they are in your thoughts during times of hardship and sorrow with this classy handmade sympathy card. The main feature of the design is white satin bow mounted to the silver square frame with elegant floral pattern and accented with a heart shaped pendant and round crystals.

This luxury boxed sympathy card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Sympathy Card 'Thinking of You'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Sympathy Cards
Price: 19.50

This elegant card is perfect to let your near and dear ones know that you are thinking about them at difficult times of hardship and sorrow. The main feature of the design is a white paper pot with ribbon and paper roses mounted to the black paper frame overprinted with elegant floral pattern. The whole arrangement is beautifully hand-decorated with stones, heart-shaped clear acrylic pendant and black satin bow.

This luxury boxed sympathy card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.
